text: āṉāl tīmaiyaic campātippavarkaḷukku, (avarkaḷ ceyta) tīmaikkuk kūliyāka atupōṉṟa tīmaiyākum! Avarkaḷai iḻivu cūḻntu koḷḷum; avarkaḷai allāhviṉ (taṇṭaṉaiyai) viṭṭuk kāppāṟṟupavar evarumilar; iruṇṭa iruḷaiyuṭaiya iraviṉ orupākam avarkaḷ mukaṅkaḷaic cūḻntu caṟṟik koḷḷappaṭṭatu pōl (avarkaḷiṉ) mukaṅkaḷ kāṇappaṭum. Avarkaḷ naraka neruppukku uriyavarkaḷ. Avarkaḷ aṅkēyē eṉṟeṉṟum iruppārkaḷ
